My name is Tommy and I specialize in design and user experience.

Although I mainly do front-end web design for a living, I have recently been busy automating many of my redundant tasks.

After doing some reading and research, I realized that I should be doing more and allowing myself to experiment.

This blog is my attempt to do just that - to apply everything new that I learn and have fun doing it.

I'm Tommy and this is a collection of my works.

This is my repertoire: a list of snippets and components that rule my world.

Here, you will mainly find snippets/components for HTML, CSS/SASS, JavaScript, and jQuery.
